cause.description:
Member should post pictures either from internet sources but preferably pictures they have taken themselves of impoverished people and places
The purpose is to raise awareness through pictures
1. A picture is worth a 1000 words, one picture of an impoverished person or place can open eyes and raise awareness
cause.mission: Post pictures (preferably taken by the member) of impoverished people/places to raise awareness of this never ending problem
cause.name: Spreading Awareness about Poverty through Photography
